intro: Pellionia tsoongii, commonly known as Chinese nettle or silver leaf plant, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes many species of nettles. The plant is characterized by its soft, hairy leaves that are often silver or gray in color. It produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are typically green or white. Pellionia tsoongii is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage.
